name: Machine Maiden
summary: Hero has only recently graduated and now he's been hired for a job. He is given the assignment to raise artificial intellect girl named Alia, but commonly known as Doll. What results can he attain in one month?
info:
• 中文名: 机器少女
  • 原画: CARNELIAN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游戏引擎: MEGU ver1.50
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1999/02/26
  • 官方网站: https://web.archive.org/web/20030603180939/http://www.dice-soft.co.jp/evolution/
